attributes.action: Not to allow the tour operators to raise holiday prices during school holidays!
attributes.additional_details:
I find it crazy how schools etc go to so much trouble giving parents fines, possibly prison sentence etc..... for taking THEIR children out of school to take them
On a lovely Holliday that they can’t afford in the holidays when yet all they need is to target the tour operators to keep the holiday prices affordable!! And not £2000 more because it’s half term!! Completely unacceptable!
attributes.background: Tour operators should NOT be allowed to raise holiday prices in school holidays!!! If they didn’t then parents would not take their children out of school!
